about_the_game:
Two brothers stuck in the world of computer games. They have to fix it to get out. An isometric homage to digital games culture and the art of playing together. Challenge your logic, cooperation and coordination.

What is Pushmania?

  • a logical puzzle game that can be played together on one machine

  • a heartfelt story about two brothers made by real two brothers

Pusmania DEMO comes with a lot to enjoy!

  • 35 maps (+ 12 tutorial maps)

  • 7 different collections (some hidden, all unlockable)

  • story hub with NPCs and persistent exploration

  • an full-featured editor for creating simple maps (more object variety can be unlocked in the full game); the same editor we used during the development

If you enjoy our Demo, please consider buying the full game!
František & Zdeněk
